txt.en: Some of the ice-giants did not make it inside before the battle in Thyrstáth. They may be grateful if you come to their rescue.
Call Hórin and talk to him
'I must tell Chieftain Hrungrod of this....'
'I accept your aid, small one, but you should not be here.'
Several ice-giants have been caught between the battle between the Orcs and hobgoblins.\n\nYou should rescue harassed ice-giants in Thyrstáth.
Use the summoning horn to call Hórin to your side.\n\nYou should talk to Hórin.
'I think we may have made a good first impression! If at least one of those giants informs their leader that we helped them, that may prove sufficient for him to grant us an audience.'
'Some of the ice-giants did not make it inside before the battle began, and are now trapped between the Orcs and the hobgoblins. We should come to their rescue, and earn their favour!'
